name: Success Fail Popup Message For Contact Form 7
author: silverplugins217

sections.description:
Success Fail Popup Message For Contact Form 7 to make the best way to set up poup on success and failed messages so a visitor will be attracted to that. After submitting form Open Popup in contact form 7. it can be made a success and failed popup message in contact form 7.

Popup Message open after Contact Form 7 submit plugin will replace default messages shown by contact form 7 with beautiful popup messages. The plugin handles all error messages and success messages with a beautiful popup message.

FEATURES FOR SUCCESS FAIL POPUP MESSAGE FOR CONTACT FROM 7:

  • Easy to use
  • Success Message Settings
  • Enable/Disable Success popup
  • Success Popup Width, Border Radius and Auto Hide after message
  • Success Popup Select Background color or Background Image or Gradient Color
  • Success Popup Text Color and Button background color
  • Success Button Text
  • WPML Support

ðŸŒŸ Documentation | ðŸŒŸ Demo | ðŸŒŸ Pro | ðŸŒŸ Support

FEATURES FOR SUCCESS FAIL POPUP MESSAGE FOR CONTACT FROM 7 PREMIUM:

  • Failure message Settings
  • Enable/Disable Failure popup
  • Failure Popup Width, Border Radius and Auto Hide after message
  • Failure Popup Select Background color or Background Image or Gradient Color
  • Failure Popup Text Color and Button background color
  • Failure Button Text

CONTRIBUTE AND TRANSLATE

Success Fail Popup Message For Contact Form 7 is translated into multiple languages Chinese, Dutch, Russian, Spanish, and many more. Help localize calculation for contact form 7 even further by adding your locale Language. Click Here
sections.faq:
How to Use Success Fail Popup Message For Contact Form 7

This plugin use to contact from 7 in Success Messages and Failure Message get popup messages.
